backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with all core data types for users, drivers, trips, payments, and video metadata, and initializes access control and approval state with mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Contains type definitions for old and new data models and supports migrating stored trip records by adding the new declineReason field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend driver decline action update to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based OKLCH color variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring meta tags, icons, and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/ops/publish-draft-v29-to-produc: Production release checklist for Draft Version 29 covering build verification, authentication, role flows, dashboards, and Stripe configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing and state logic handling authentication, profile checks, role selection, and dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalPendingS: Displays an approval-waiting screen with instructions, requirements, and messages based on user type.
frontend/src/components/BookingRequestFo: Form for users to request bookings with geolocation capture, driver selection, pricing logic, and checkout creation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with a scroll-to-video button and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with authentication controls, theme switching, language selection, and user role display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to set up profiles, capture location, upload photos, and submit driver or customer info for approval.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionMod: Modal for choosing a user role (customer or driver) and notifying the parent when selected.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Form for selecting a service type, driver, trip details, and creating a trip with pricing and distance validation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupCheck: Admin-only dialog prompting initial Stripe configuration with secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/TripDetailsDialo: Dialog showing full trip details with driver actions, status updates, pricing, and administrative inputs.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: Custom video player with play, mute, fullscreen controls and optional autoplay-muted behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user, driver, trip, and earnings data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Handles language detection, local storage of language preference, and key‑based translation with fallbacks.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Creates an i18n context provider that stores language preference and exposes a translate function.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and structured translation strings for the UI.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a hook that returns the i18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines light and dark theme variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Implements an admin dashboard showing approvals, stats, and access to the company wallet with translation support.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Client dashboard showing active/completed trips, booking CTA, service form, and trip details dialog.
frontend/src/pages/CompanyWallet.tsx: Displays company earnings, commissions, deposits, and completed trip metrics using Stripe-backed data.
frontend/src/pages/DriverDashboard.tsx: Driver dashboard presenting trip stats, earnings summary, pending jobs, and access to detailed wallet and trip views.
frontend/src/pages/DriverWallet.tsx: Shows detailed driver earnings, deductions, and trip payment statuses with breakdowns by category.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, login buttons, instructional video, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/utils/distance.ts: Provides Haversine-based distance calculation and formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/tripPricing.ts: Handles manual mileage-based trip pricing, deposit/service fee rules, and distance validation.
frontend/src/utils/tripProgress.ts: Implements logic to map trip status and status updates to a UI-friendly progress state including step, labels, messages, and next driver actions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, spacing, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and custom OKLCH-based design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, architecture, features, and known issues for the Cityprop ICP full‑stack dApp.
